artist: Artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Publisher: Iseya Sanjirō
inscription:
The summer night is so short / that while evening still seems here / dawn is already coming. / Where in the cloud, I wonder, / has my moon retreated.

(Natsu no yo wa / mada yoi nagara / akenuru wo / kumo no izuko ni / tsuki yadoruran)
markings: censor seal: kiwame 極; publisher\'s seal: Eijudō 永寿堂
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Poems Explained by the Nurse (Hyakunin isshu uba ga etoki 百人一首うはか縁説)
signed: Saki no Hokusai Manji 前北斎卍
title: Poem by Kiyowara no Fukayabu
